# Drinking Water Reminder App

## Project Overview
A Next.js + React drinking water reminder app with cute design and motivational messages, ready for Vercel deployment.

## Setup Progress
- [x] Create project structure and setup
- [ ] Create main water reminder component
- [ ] Add motivational messages system
- [ ] Add reminder notifications
- [ ] Style with cute design
- [ ] Test and verify deployment readiness

## Stack
- Next.js 15+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React hooks for state management
